lessonSubtitleText: Test how well you know this story

questions.text: What did the Israelites need to cross?
Why was it dangerous to cross the Jordan River?
answers: The water was flowing fast that time of year
The Israelites didn't know how to swim

questions.text: What did Joshua tell the priests to do?
answers: Float the ark in the water

questions.text: What did Joshua say would happen when the priests entered the river?
answers: The water would turn to blood

questions.text: When did the water stop flowing?
answers: Right when the priests stepped into the river

questions.text: What did this miracle show the Israelites?
answers: God was with them in the Promised Land
God likes parting rivers and sea
The river was not very deep
Joshua was good at doing miracles

questions.text: What did Joshua tell twelve men to do?
answers: Collect twelve stones from the river

questions.text: What did Joshua do with the stones?
answers: He made a large pile to help the people remember
He threw them back into the river
He built an altar for sacrifices
He gave one to each priest

questions.text: What would the Israelites tell their children when they asked about the stones?
answers: God stopped the Jordan River so we could cross
We built this so we don't get lost
